title: 'Flight 232': Survival And Heroism In Sioux City
teaser: Twenty-five years ago, United Airlines Flight 232 crash-landed in Sioux City, Iowa. NPR's Scott Simon speaks with Laurence Gonzales, author of the book Flight 232: A Story of Disaster and Survival.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
